Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.align.NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix

  • Packages that use NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.align
    This package contains classes used to create or parse alignments.
    org.jcvi.jillion.align.pairwise
    This package contains classes for performing pair-wise alignments of two sequences.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trim.lucy
    This package contains trimmer implementations that follow the algorithms used by the TIGR program LUCY that was used to trim sanger reads.

    • Uses of NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix in org.jcvi.jillion.align

      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.align that return NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix NucleotideSubstitutionMatrixBuilder.build() 
      static NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix NucleotideSubstitutionMatrices.getIdentityMatrix()
      A NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix that has a match score of 1 and a mismatch score of -4.
      static NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix NucleotideSubstitutionMatrices.getNuc44()
      NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix created by Todd Lowe on 12/10/1992 commonly referred to as "NUC.4.4" and used by NCBI Blast .
      static NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix NucleotideSubstitutionMatrices.parsePropertyFile(InputStream in)
      Parse an InputStream which is a text file of a single nucleotide substitution matrix.

    • Uses of NucleotideSubstitutionMatrix in org.jcvi.jillion.align.pairwise

      Create a new PairwiseAlignmentBuilder to align 2 NucleotideSequences.
